titleStmt.title: A consideration of the papists reasons of state and religion, for toleration of poperie in England intimated in their supplication vnto the Kings Maiestie, [and] the states of the present Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Powel, Gabriel, 1576-1611.
Colleton, John, 1548-1635. Supplication to the Kings most excellent Majestie. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Joseph Barnes, and are to bee sold in Paules Church-yarde at the signe of the Crowne, by Simon VVaterson,

notesStmt.note: Includes "A supplication to the Kings most excellent Majestie", attributed to John Colleton.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yarde at the signe of the Crowne
